Blog.post: haha... was expecting this day to be abit boring as usual.. morning work till 2pm.. after that go gym meet Zen for work out.. tired yet amusing.. haha.. supposed to meet sina and didi for dinner, skalee didi can't make it, left me and sina, was kinda pathetic.. but nevermind coz quite used to it liao.. so juz jalan jalan first then was told to have dinner wif her frenz (which was abit weird coz bday celebrating wif pple i duno).. but it's still better than celebrating alone! datz the worst thing i could ever imagine! who knows all her frenz turned out to be our cg members!!! hahaha.... really surprised me! a simple yet warm dinner... felt so blessed.. really thank all of them for making this happened!

grrr.... so irritating! when i stepped into the office, i saw him in my office again! really feel like giving both of them a scolding/threshing! this is office, if you want to be lovey dovey, please do it after work at ur house or wat.. dun treat others transparent, can ur be more considerate! giggling and laughing like nobody's biz.. it's very disturbing! i believe u dun want to feel how i feel rite.. so please stop all ur nonsense and WORK when u are in office! i really cant stand it anymore!! i want to QUIT this job!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! argh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! there's a limit to my patience! although bible tells me to mind my own biz, they have already exceeded my limit of tolerance! really feel like BITING them if i can!!!

after last nite's work out, my arm muscles are aching again.. duno why i feel happy? maybe coz i know the muscles are forming and soon i can see the shape.. keke.. strange Jean.. haiz.. so bored now..

today half day.. so shiok! went for blood test this morning at SGH, cost me $43. now at work, so bored.. later going gym to meet Zen.. hopefully tonite dun need to do any too vigorous exercise, else there goes my face and pants! oh please.. God protect me!!
haha... so happy... finally after one week, i can call/sms out! it's so terrible having a hp but can't call out.. feels crippled.. =)

aiyo.. today very suay.. 1st day.. haiz.. gotta cancel tmr nite's gym wif Zen.. told him the reason he laughed at me.. hmm.. =( oh yah.. i was featured in the mediacorptv website, the pic so ugly.. taken when i was touching up my make-up in the hall.. yucks! why they pick such a foto and put it up?! oh God.. mi tummy ache.. *sobs*

hai.. life is miserable w/o hp.. it feels more miserable if you haf a hp but cant call out or sms out.. ah!!! nvm... it's a result of my actions.. i haf to bear the consequence! yesterday's weather was terrible... made me feel feverish, now i'm having a running nose.. dun wanna get Upper Respiratory Track Infection again... it feels sick! Last nite work out was quite tiring but fun.. it's coz of the PT lah.. always suan and make fun of me.. haha.. interesting Xiao Di Di.. his look reminds me of Catherine's bf - Ryan.. but PT is taller and fitter.. alrite.. shan't talk so much about him.. or else he will feel proud..

wow... my 1st blog after many donkey months.. used to have one blog, but long time never use, already forgotten the username and pw le.. last week, went to cali gym on tue and thur.. interesting, but tiring and expensive.. can really feel the pain when giving the money to the cashier... almost given $600+ to the gym... duno shld i feel regret or happy? makes me broke but strong... aiyo... wat toking me?? makes no sense.. since already paid the money, watz the point of dwelling in the "pain".. work hard to keep fit lor.. hmm.. last sat went for Singapore Idol.. queued up at 330am... gurmit singh interviewed me at 415am... rained at 5am+.. re-queued at 6am.. was soaked from head to toe.. cold and hungry and tired... dun tink would want to haf a second try again.. it's mentally, physically, vocally, emotionally draining! esp i din get in to 2nd round... it's funny! i'm dun feel disappointed at all.. izit coz i'm numb to it ord? or m i juz too tired to tink? i guess i juz went for the sake of fun, datz y not pinning any hopes on myself.. it's good lah, no hope no hurt... haha... What happened to me? why do i sound so negative and pessimistic?? haiz... Pst Kong is right, richer ppl always feels happier than poorer ppl... I MUST BUCK UP AND EARN MORE MONEY!! not for the sake of myself, but for my family, my future, those who need help.. so dat i can haf money to help them out.. kk.. should stop here and do my work le.. Jeanz

haha... surprisingly i had another free comp session wif trainer.. managed to learn a few more new machines to trim off some of the fats on my arms and thighs.. zen told me those machines not good... bluff me again!! quite annoyed by him, about 75% of the things he told me and not real! stupid zen! thank God for Sean.. otherwise duno when can i get rid of those stubborn fats! =)
